testcase.classname: feature to test Jiva design Fabric Type screen functionality
testcase.name: To Test the Fabric Type screen
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to the Login page and enter credentials and signin......passed And Select the Fabric type screen...........................................passed Then click on the fabric type add button....................................passed And click on save button to submit the Fabric Type..........................passed When Select category dropdown...............................................passed When user enter the Fabric Name.............................................passed When User enter the content.................................................passed When User enter the supplier or internal code...............................passed When User enter the GSM1....................................................passed When User enter the Count and construction1.................................passed When User enter the width in inches.........................................passed When User enter the GSM2....................................................passed When User enter the count and construction2.................................passed When User enter the cuttable width in inches................................passed When User enter the approx lead time........................................passed Then User able to select the is nominated...................................passed When User enter the Fabric price............................................passed When User selects the Currency..............................................passed When User selects the UOM...................................................passed When User verify the Price..................................................passed Then User upload the file...................................................passed And User clicks on the cancel button........................................passed
